alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:49PM EDT until May 22 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PISCATAQUIS AND SOUTHWESTERN PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dexter, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Dexter, Corinth, Corinna, Charleston, Sangerville, Stetson, Garland, Exeter, Parkman and Atkinson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
